As a former educator, Brian has a lifelong commitment to learning that has been realized most recently via certification in Lean Six Sigma through Syracuse Universityâ€™s Whitman School of Business and their present enrollment at Code Fellows in Seattle with the intent to become a glorious Software Engineer specializing in Advanced Software Development in Python.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Created a website which will record vote recieved for given products and sum the results over consecutive polls. Built with javascript on a backbone of html and styled with CSS using chart.js to render information to the user.

projects.title: FitDOG
projects.description: Created an app which will take a dog's weight (in kg) and food characteristics (in kcal/kg) and output the amount of food reccomended to the user to maintain a healthy weight. Utilized chart.js and local storage to accomplish this tasks.

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on during my coding education. This will take inputs and generate random numbers and then return them to the screen using DOM manipulation. It was a lot of fun doing a project like this where you could actually create something that a user could interact with
